subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Bruins have a 2-0 lead in the Eastern Conference semifinal series, and Dan Carcillo may be looking for revenge after claiming to have had his finger bitten by Marc Savard.
snippet: The Bruins have a 2-0 lead in the Eastern Conference semifinal series, and Dan Carcillo may be looking for revenge after claiming to have had his finger bitten by Marc Savard.
